job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Minimum Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Experience in managing cloud native infrastructure setup</li><li>Passionate about security and have good understanding of industry best practices</li><li>Experience in programming languages like Python, Golang, and enjoying automating everything using code</li><li>Good skills and intuition on root cause issues in production environment</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Experience in Terraform</li><li>Experience in database and network management</li><li>Experience in defining security policies and best practices</li><li>Experience in managing a large scale multi cloud environment</li><li>Knowledge of SOC, GDPR or ISO 27001 security compliance standards is a plus</li></ul><p><br></p>
